meta.title: Contraindications
meta.subtitle: When Kava should not be used: Absolute and relative contraindications for safe use.

zusammenfassung.title: Important Overview
zusammenfassung.intro: Although Kava is considered safe when used properly, there are certain situations in which its use is not recommended or contraindicated:

absolute.title: Absolute Contraindications
absolute.intro: Kava should under no circumstances be used in the following conditions. The risks clearly outweigh any potential benefits.

leber.title: Liver Diseases
leber.label: Strictly contraindicated
leber.intro: Individuals with existing liver diseases should completely avoid Kava:

items.name: Fatty liver
items.text: Alcoholic and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease

items.name: Elevated liver values
items.text: Unexplained increase in ALT, AST, GGT

leber.reason: The liver is the central organ for the metabolism of Kavalactones. With impaired liver function, metabolites can accumulate and increase the risk of further damage.

schwangerschaft.title: Pregnancy & Lactation
schwangerschaft.label: Strictly contraindicated
schwangerschaft.intro: Kava should not be used during pregnancy and lactation:

items.name: No safety data
items.text: There are no controlled studies on safety during pregnancy

items.name: Placental permeability
items.text: Kavalactones can cross the placental barrier

schwangerschaft.tradition: In Pacific cultures, Kava is traditionally not consumed by pregnant or breastfeeding women.

kinder.title: Children & Adolescents
kinder.label: Not recommended under 18 years
kinder.intro: Kava should not be used by children and adolescents:

items.name: Development
items.text: Effects on brain development not studied

items.name: Metabolism
items.text: Children metabolize substances differently than adults

items.name: No studies
items.text: No clinical data for this age group

relative.title: Relative Contraindications
relative.intro: In the following conditions, particular caution is advised. Use may be possible under certain circumstances but should only be done after careful consideration and ideally after consulting a physician.

parkinson.title: Parkinson's Disease
parkinson.label: Not recommended

items.name: Levodopa interaction
items.text: May reduce the effectiveness of Levodopa

items.name: Case reports
items.text: Worsening of symptoms documented under Kava

parkinson.caseReport: Schelosky et al. (1995) reported on a 45-year-old woman with Parkinson's whose symptoms significantly worsened with Kava intake.

depression.title: Severe Depression
depression.label: Caution advised
depression.intro: Caution is warranted in cases of severe depression:
depression.note: In cases of mild to moderate anxiety, Kava may be helpful, but in severe depression, professional treatment should take precedence.

operation.title: Before Planned Surgeries
operation.label: Discontinue 2 weeks prior
operation.intro: Kava should be discontinued before planned surgeries:

items.name: Anesthesia interaction
items.text: May enhance the effects of anesthetics

items.name: Liver function
items.text: Important for the metabolism of anesthetics

operation.recommendation: Recommendation: Discontinue Kava at least 2 weeks before a planned surgery and inform the anesthetist about prior use.

fahren.title: Driving & Operating Machinery
fahren.label: Impaired driving ability
fahren.note: In contrast to benzodiazepines, studies show that Kava affects cognitive function less. Nevertheless, one should be aware of their individual reaction before driving.

vorsicht.title: Particular Caution
vorsicht.intro: In certain groups of people, increased attention is required, even if there is no strict contraindication.

genetik.title: Genetic Factors (CYP2D6 Polymorphisms)
genetik.label: Increased sensitivity possible
genetik.intro: About 5-10% of the European population are "Poor Metabolizers" for CYP2D6:

items.name: Slower metabolism
items.text: Kavalactones remain in the body longer

items.name: Recognition
items.text: Unusually strong reaction to normal doses

genetik.recommendation: If you react unusually sensitively to Kava, a genetic factor may be involved. Start with lower doses.

alter.title: Older Adults
alter.label: Adjusted dosage recommended
alter.intro: Particular caution is advised in older adults:

items.name: Fall risk
items.text: Sedation may increase the risk of falls

alter.recommendation: Start with half the usual dose and gradually increase.

entscheidungshilfe.title: Decision Aid: Is Kava Suitable for Me?

nicht.title: Kava is NOT suitable if you:
items: Have or had a liver disease

arzt.title: Talk to your doctor if you:

geeignet.title: Kava may be suitable if you:
items: Are healthy and have no liver problems
Do not take any of the medications listed above

generalAdvice.title: General Recommendation
generalAdvice.text: In case of doubt, consult a doctor or pharmacist before consuming Kava, especially if you regularly take medications or have health limitations.

warnzeichen.title: Warning Signs: When You Should Stop Immediately
warnzeichen.intro: Stop consumption immediately and consult a doctor if you experience:
warnzeichen.note: These symptoms may indicate liver problems and require immediate medical evaluation.
